flawed_nl_solution:
Marianne is 20 - 8 = <<20-8=9>>9 years older than Bella.
Bella will turn 18 in 18 - 8 = <<18-8=10>>10 years.
So, Marianne will be 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30 years old then.
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
